name: MTLRenderPassDepthAttachmentDescriptor
desc: A depth render target that serves as the output destination for depth pixels generated by a render pass.

items.name: var clearDepth: Double
items.desc: The depth to use when clearing the depth attachment.

items.name: var depthResolveFilter: MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter
items.desc: The filter used for an MSAA depth resolve operation.

items.name: enum MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter
items.desc: Filtering options for controlling an MSAA depth resolve operation.
